title: The DeVirginator (CRS117)
description:
A Classic RISK! Singles episode! A story that Peter Kim first shared on the podcast in April of 2015 about a friendship that fell to pieces.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Peter Kim, Kevin Allison)
